meanings.sent1: Hitherto, I had never seen such a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent2: We had hitherto always taken the same route to school.
meanings.sent3: The cat hitherto believed it was the ruler of the house.
meanings.sent4: Her talent had hitherto remained hidden, like a buried treasure.
meanings.sent5: The old clock chimed hitherto unheard melodies.

meanings.sent1: Hitherto, I had not realized how much I missed her.
meanings.sent2: He had hitherto been unaware of the secret hiding spot.
meanings.sent3: The magician hitherto failed to make the rabbit disappear.
meanings.sent4: The truth had hitherto eluded him like a ghost in the night.
meanings.sent5: The garden had hitherto bloomed with unseen colors.

meanings.sent1: Hitherto, the old house had stood abandoned.
meanings.sent2: The treasure map had hitherto been hidden in the attic.
meanings.sent3: The mystery had hitherto remained unsolved by the detective.
meanings.sent4: The key had hitherto been lost in the depths of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The ancient ruins had hitherto been shrouded in myth and legend.
